headline: A Fresh Look at Global Payments (GPN) Valuation Following Uber Eats Partnership and Genius Platform Upgrades
summary: Global Payments has partnered with Uber Eats, making the delivery service the preferred partner for restaurants using its Genius POS platform across the U.S. and Canada. This move underscores the company’s technology-driven approach to improving efficiency for restaurant customers. See our latest analysis for Global Payments. Despite high-profile partnerships and recent upgrades to its Genius platform, Global Payments’ share price return has trended sharply lower this year, with a 1-year...
